item.description:
I hope everyone enjoyed a nice Thanksgiving Holiday, and didn't eat too much turkey & trimmings.

The primary topic for this meeting will be "Developing Trading Rules and Trading Plans." Some may consider Trading Rules and Trading Plans to be one and the same thing. They are not, but while they are different, they are also very inter-related, and we will take an in-depth look at how, when, where, and why.
Since this subject involves a great deal of information, I anticipate it will be the focused theme over our next several meetings.

If you currently have a set of Trading Rules (hopefully ones you actually use), it would be helpful if you could bring a written copy of them to the meeting.

Since this meeting is after-hours, we are free to use the Library's parking lot. Our meeting room is downstairs and to the right.

Hope to see you all there!
Ray

group.name: The Charlestown Investor's Business Daily Forum

item.name: The Charlestown Investor's Business Daily Forum November Meetup
